name: Magical Solitaire Free!
description:
Blast those blasted cards!

We've taken everyone's favourite solitaire games, and added a fun spin- when you complete games, you are rewarded with potions. Potions can be used to shuffle cards and reveal hidden stacks. But you've only got a limited number, so don't use them all at once!

It's still the same challenging game you're used to, but with an added layer of fun!

With 3 different solitaire games to play (Klondike, Corona, and Russian Solitaire), and 2 different potions to help you out, you'll never get bored.

There is full undo, and detailed help in case you need it.

You can upgrade via an in-app purchase to unlock 2 extra types of potions, and 4 extra games...

Try it out today!
